alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 1:27AM CST until February 16 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Southern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Texas County in south central Missouri... Southwestern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 215 AM CST. * At 126 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles south of Richland to 10 miles west of Houston to 11 miles southeast of Norwood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood, Montauk State Park, Waynesville, Mountain Grove, St. Robert, Licking, Cabool, Houston, Raymondville, Edgar Springs, Huggins, Plato, Montauk, Beulah, Success, Eunice, Laquey, Yukon, Roby and Solo. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 144 and 165, between mile markers 167 and 168, and between mile markers 180 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
